          <title>
            <string language="en">Generators</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Generatoren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Générateurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geradores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generatori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεννήτριες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Generadores</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing that in a generator, a coil of wire rotates in a magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">axles</string>
          </keyword>

            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen fangen das 
Zeigen, daß in einem Generator, eine Spule der Leitung in ein 
magnetisches sich dreht auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations prouvant que dans 
un générateur, un enroulement de fil tourne dans un champ 
magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram 
que em um gerador, uma bobina do fio gira em um campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che indicano 
che in un generatore, una bobina di legare ruota in un campo 
magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που δείχνουν ότι σε μια 
γεννήτρια, ένα πηνίο του καλωδίου περιστρέφεται σε ένα 
μαγνητικό πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran que en 
un generador, una bobina del alambre rota en un campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
